Title: Step 3: Reflections and Next Steps
Text: Now that I've attended the Self-Defense Awareness Workshop, it might be wise to revisit Marcus Eldridge at the Town Hall. He mentioned that this workshop was just the beginning. I should check in with him to see what my next steps should be in securing my Personal Defense Permit.
CompleteText: I revisited the Town Hall and spoke with Marcus Eldridge. He commended me on completing the workshop and expressed the importance of continuing my training. Itâ€™s clear that understanding self-defense goes beyond simple awareness. Marcus hinted at a more practical approach to defense in the next phase of my journey.
